Author: reijn
Text: It's hard to base my weight on a lower number when I know if I return to eating I'll gain like 6lbs of water weight. I'm semi-pleased with the number in the scale (as long as it keeps going down I'm in a mini plateau right now) but if I eat dinner it'll go the other way and ugh I agonize over knowing that this weight is not real. I can't base my weight on a number that's temporary.

Author: plntgirl
Text: Mine does this too so I don’t fkn know which is supposed to be my real weight??? It’s from sodium/carbs and food just chilling in your digestive tract which makes me feel gross
